title.narrative: Xinjiang Technical and Vocational Education and Training Project

description.narrative: Improve the quality and relevance of project schools to produce students' skills that respond to the labor market demand in Xinjiang.

International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual work plans | Description :Project Agreement, Section I, B. 3: Project Implementing Entity shall prepare adraft consolidated annual work plan for the following fiscal year by January 30. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Mid-Term Review | Description :Project Agreement, Section II, A. 2: To Prepare and submit to the Bank an MTRreport no later than July 30, 2018. | Due Date :30-Jul-2018

Finance Agreement :Project Expert Team (PET) | Description :Project Agreement, Section I, B 2(b): Obligation of the PMO to maintaina Project Expert Team responsible for providing technical support to the PMO. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Plan (PIP) | Description :Project Agreement, Section I, B.1: Obligation of the PMO tocarry out the project in accordance with the PIP. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguards monitoring | Description :Project Implementing Entity shall, and shall cause the Project Schools to,take all measures necessary on their part to regularly collect, compile, and submit to the Bank, as part of the Project Reports,information on the status of compliance with the Safeguards Instruments. | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Subsidiary Agreements | Description :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section I, A.1: XUARED to make loan availableto each project school through a subsidiary agreement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
